description: CMIP6 PID Kernel Information Profile for datasets

AGGREGATION_LEVEL.description: Data object type, dataset or file

DRS_ID.description: CMIP6 data reference syntax, the dataset's drs_id

FIXED_CONTENT.description: Indicated that content will stay bit-equal, true or false

HAS_PARTS.description: dataset has sub datasets, semicolon-separated list, with "hdl:" prepended.

HOSTING_NODE.description: original data node of this dataset (max 1), contains host and publication date, so that the most recent one can be used, HTML snippet

REPLACED_BY.description: handle of following version, pid with "hdl:"

REPLACES.description: handle of previous version, pid with "hdl:"

REPLICA_NODE.description: data node for replicas of this dataset, contains host and publication date, HTML snippet

UNPUBLISHED_REPLICAS.description: data node for unpublished replicas of this dataset, contains host and publication date, HTML snippet

_ADDED_ERRATA_IDS.description: removed errata information, string and timestamp

_REMOVED_ERRATA_IDS.description: removed errata information, string and timestamp

_REMOVED_HOSTS.description: removed data nodes for original datasets, hostname and timestamp
